en: Narrator: Peppa, George, Mummy and Daddy are having breakfast. It is a lovely sunny day, and Peppa and George can’t wait to go into the garden to play.
cn: 旁白：佩奇、乔治、妈妈和爸爸正在吃早餐。今天天气晴朗，佩奇和乔治迫不及待想去花园玩。

sentence.en: Peppa and George can’t wait to go into the garden to play.
sentence.cn: 佩奇和乔治迫不及待想去花园玩。

examples.en: I can’t wait to see you.
We can’t wait to go on holiday.
examples.cn: 我们迫不及待想去度假。

en: Peppa Pig: Mummy, please can we go out to play?
cn: 小猪佩奇：妈妈，我们可以出去玩吗？

en: Mummy Pig: You can go out to play when you finish your breakfast.
cn: 猪妈妈：你们吃完早餐就可以出去玩。

en: Daddy Pig: George, don’t drink your juice too quickly.
cn: 猪爸爸：乔治，不要喝得太快。

sentence.en: don’t drink your juice too quickly

examples.en: Don’t eat your food too quickly.
Don’t run too quickly.

en: Narrator: George drank his juice too quickly, and now he has hiccups.
cn: 旁白：乔治喝得太快，现在打嗝了。

en: Peppa Pig: Can we go out to play now, Mummy?
cn: 小猪佩奇：妈妈，我们现在可以出去玩吗？

en: Mummy Pig: Not while George has hiccups.
cn: 猪妈妈：乔治还在打嗝，不能出去玩。

sentence.cn: 乔治还在打嗝，不能出去玩。

examples.en: Not while it’s raining.
Not while you’re eating.
examples.cn: 吃东西的时候不能(说话)。

en: Peppa Pig: But George’s hiccups have gone, Mummy. Haven’t they, George?
cn: 小猪佩奇：妈妈，乔治的嗝已经好了，对吧，乔治？

examples.en: My hiccups have gone.
The rain has gone.

en: Mummy Pig: Oh, all right. You can go out and play. But look after George.
cn: 猪妈妈：好吧，你们可以出去玩，但要照顾好乔治。

en: Narrator: Peppa and George love playing in the garden.
cn: 旁白：佩奇和乔治喜欢在花园里玩。

en: Peppa Pig: George, I’m going to throw the ball and then you have to catch it.
cn: 小猪佩奇：乔治，我要扔球，你要接住哦。

examples.en: You have to catch the ball.
You have to finish your homework.

en: Peppa Pig: George, please stop hiccuping.
cn: 小猪佩奇：乔治，别再打嗝了。

en: Peppa Pig: George!
cn: 小猪佩奇：乔治！

en: Peppa Pig: Now you throw the ball to me and I have to catch it.
cn: 小猪佩奇：现在你扔球给我，我来接。

en: Peppa Pig: George!
cn: 小猪佩奇：乔治！

en: Narrator: Oh, dear. George’s hiccups are spoiling the game.
cn: 旁白：糟糕，乔治的嗝影响了游戏。

sentence.en: George’s hiccups are spoiling the game

examples.en: The rain is spoiling the picnic.
His bad mood is spoiling the party.
examples.cn: 他的坏情绪影响了派对。

en: Peppa Pig: George, I know how to cure hiccups. You have to do what I say.
cn: 小猪佩奇：乔治，我知道怎么治打嗝，你要听我的。

sentence.en: You have to do what I say

examples.en: You have to do what I tell you.
You have to do what the teacher says.

en: Peppa Pig: Rub the top of your head and rub your tummy.
cn: 小猪佩奇：揉揉你的头顶，再揉揉肚子。

points.en: rub the top of your head

en: Peppa Pig: Good. Now your hiccups have gone.
cn: 小猪佩奇：好了，现在你的嗝没了。

en: Narrator: Peppa’s cure for hiccups doesn’t seem to have worked.
cn: 旁白：佩奇的方法似乎没用。

sentence.en: Peppa’s cure for hiccups doesn’t seem to have worked

examples.en: His cure for the cold doesn’t seem to have worked.
examples.cn: 他治感冒的方法似乎没用。

examples.en: Her solution to the problem doesn’t seem to have worked.
examples.cn: 她解决问题的方法似乎没用。

en: Peppa Pig: George, you’ve done it all wrong. I know a better way to cure hiccups. First, jump up and down three times on one leg.
cn: 小猪佩奇：乔治，你做错了。我知道更好的办法。先单腿跳三下。

sentence.en: I know a better way to cure hiccups
sentence.cn: 我知道更好的治打嗝的方法

examples.en: I know a better way to cook pasta.
examples.cn: 我知道更好的煮意大利面的办法。

examples.en: I know a better way to solve this problem.
examples.cn: 我知道更好的解决这个问题的方法。

en: Peppa Pig: Now wave your arms up and down and stick your tongue out.
cn: 小猪佩奇：现在挥挥手臂，伸出舌头。

points.en: wave your arms up and down

en: Peppa Pig: And now close your eyes and turn around quickly three times.
cn: 小猪佩奇：现在闭上眼睛，快速转三圈。

en: Narrator: Peppa’s new cure hasn’t worked either. George still has hiccups.
cn: 旁白：佩奇的新方法也没用，乔治还在打嗝。

sentence.en: Peppa’s new cure hasn’t worked either

examples.en: His new plan hasn’t worked either.
Her new idea hasn’t worked either.

en: Peppa Pig: I know. To cure hiccups the ill piggy must be given a shock. George, I’m going to scare you, but you must remember it’s only a game and it will stop your hiccups.
cn: 小猪佩奇：我知道了，要治打嗝得吓一跳。乔治，我要吓你，但记住只是游戏，这样嗝就会停。

sentence.en: it’s only a game and it will stop your hiccups
sentence.cn: 只是游戏，这样嗝就会停

examples.en: It’s only a joke, and it will make you laugh.
examples.cn: 只是个笑话，这样你就会笑。

examples.en: It’s only a story, and it will help you sleep.
examples.cn: 只是个故事，这样你就能睡着。

en: Peppa Pig: Remember, this is just pretend scaring.
cn: 小猪佩奇：记住，这只是装装样子。

examples.en: This is just pretend playing.
This is just pretend cooking.

en: Mummy Pig: Peppa, you mustn’t play so roughly with George. He’s only little.
cn: 猪妈妈：佩奇，不能和乔治玩得太粗鲁，他还小。

sentence.en: you mustn’t play so roughly with George
sentence.cn: 不能和乔治玩得太粗鲁

examples.en: You mustn’t drive so fast.
You mustn’t talk so loudly.

en: Peppa Pig: Sorry, Mummy. I was just trying to stop George’s hiccups.
cn: 小猪佩奇：对不起，妈妈。我只是想帮乔治止嗝。

sentence.en: I was just trying to stop George’s hiccups

examples.en: I was just trying to help you.
I was just trying to make you laugh.

en: Narrator: George’s hiccups have gone.
cn: 旁白：乔治的嗝好了。

en: Narrator: Here comes Daddy Pig with two beakers of juice.
cn: 旁白：猪爸爸端来了两杯果汁。

sentence.en: Here comes Daddy Pig with two beakers of juice
sentence.cn: 猪爸爸端来了两杯果汁

examples.en: Here comes the bus with the children.
examples.cn: 校车来了，孩子们都在里面。

examples.en: Here comes the clown with balloons.
examples.cn: 小丑来了，手里拿着气球。

en: Mummy Pig: George, if you drink too quickly you will get hiccups again.
cn: 猪妈妈：乔治，如果你喝得太快又会打嗝。

en: Peppa Pig: I’m not as little as George. I can drink juice as quickly as I want to.
cn: 小猪佩奇：我不像乔治那么小，我想多快喝果汁都行。

points.en: as quickly as I want to
